thread.title: Great place to stay
thread.title_full: Great place to stay - Review of Emeraude Hotel Plaza Etoile, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: peter d
title: Great place to stay
text:
Stayed about a week with two children--room relatively large. Reception excellent, friendly. Location great. Beds comfortable. Could use some better lighting in room. Would recommend the hotel and staff highly.
Room Tip: we were on first floor and ok, except for lack of privacy-- See more room tips
